entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023
